import React from 'react'; import { Slide } from 'react-slideshow-image'; import './slideshow.css' import 'react-slideshow-image/dist/styles.css' const slideImages = [ 'images/armbanden/Rood_hardjes.jpg', 'images/armbanden/Rood_hardjes.jpg', ]; const Slideshow = () => { return (
Word of the Day be{bull}nev{bull}o{bull}lent adjective well meaning and kindly.
{'"a benevolent smile"'}
) }; export default Slideshow;
